headline: Egress, a KnowBe4 Company, Named a Leader in Gartner First Magic Quadrant for Email Security Platforms
summary: LONDON - Egress, a KnowBe4 company, the first provider of adaptive AI-enabled email security, today announced it has been recognized as a Leader in 2024 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Email Security...
